00032       {
00033          this.name = name;
00034          this.namespaceName = namespaceName;
00035          this.attributes = attributes;

00049       protected UserType(String name, String namespaceName, TypeAttributes attributes, IdEntry elementType) : this(name, namespaceName, attributes)
00050       {
00051          this.elementType = elementType;
00052          this.Entry = new IdEntry();
00053          this.Entry.ReflectionObject = this;
00054          this.baseType = new IdEntry();
00055          this.baseType.ReflectionObject = typeof (Array);

00064       public MethodInfo GetInterfaceMethod(string name, Type[] types)
00065       {
00066          foreach (Type t in GetInterfaces())
00067          {
00068             MethodInfo ret = t.GetMethod(name, types);
00069             if (ret != null)
00070                return ret;
00071          }
00072          return null;
00073       }

00124       public override Type GetInterface(string name, bool ignoreCase)
00125       {
00126          Type ret = null;
00127          List<IdEntry>.Enumerator en = interfaces.GetEnumerator();
00128          bool found = false;
00129          StringComparison compare = ignoreCase ? StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase : StringComparison.Ordinal;
00130          while (en.MoveNext() && !found)
00131          {
00132             ret = (Type)en.Current.ReflectionObject;
00133             found = ret.Name.Equals(name, compare);
00134          }
00135          return found ? ret : (this.baseType != null ? BaseType.GetInterface(name, ignoreCase) : null);
00136       }
00137 
00145       public override Type[] GetInterfaces()
00146       {
00147          List<Type> ret = new List<Type>(LibraryChecker.ToArray<Type>(interfaces.ToArray()));
00148          if (baseType != null)
00149             ret.AddRange(BaseType.GetInterfaces());
00150          return ret.ToArray();
00151       }

00301       protected override MethodInfo GetMethodImpl(string name, BindingFlags bindingAttr, Binder binder, CallingConventions callConvention, Type[] types, ParameterModifier[] modifiers)
00302       {
00303          binder = CustomBinder.Default;
00304          List<MethodInfo> met = new List<MethodInfo>();
00305          foreach (MethodInfo m in this.GetMethods(bindingAttr))
00306          {
00307             if (m.Name.Equals(name))
00308                met.Add(m);
00309          }
00310          if (this.IsInterface)
00311          {
00312             foreach (Type t in this.GetInterfaces())
00313             {
00314                foreach (MethodInfo m in t.GetMethods(bindingAttr))
00315                {
00316                   if (m.Name.Equals(name))
00317                      met.Add(m);
00318                }
00319             }
00320          }
00321 
00322          if (met.Count == 0)
00323             return null;
00324 
00325          return (MethodInfo)binder.SelectMethod(bindingAttr, met.ToArray(), types, modifiers);
00326       }
00327 
00335       public override MethodInfo[] GetMethods(BindingFlags bindingAttr)
00336       {
00337          if ((bindingAttr & BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy) != 0 && BaseType != null)
00338          {
00339             List<MethodInfo> ret = new List<MethodInfo>(methods);
00340             ret.AddRange(BaseType.GetMethods(bindingAttr));
00341             return ret.ToArray();
00342          }
00343          else
00344          {
00345             return methods.ToArray();
00346          }
00347       }
00348 
00358       public override FieldInfo GetField(string name, BindingFlags bindingAttr)
00359       {
00360          FieldInfo ret = null;
00361          List<FieldInfo>.Enumerator en = fields.GetEnumerator();
00362          bool found = false;
00363          while (en.MoveNext() && !found)
00364          {
00365             ret = en.Current;
00366             found = en.Current.Name.Equals(name);
00367          }
00368          return found ? ret : (this.BaseType != null ? BaseType.GetField(name, bindingAttr) : null);
00369       }

00390       public override MemberInfo[] GetMembers(BindingFlags bindingAttr)
00391       {
00392          List<MemberInfo> ret = new List<MemberInfo>();
00393          ret.AddRange(methods.ToArray());
00394          ret.AddRange(constructors.ToArray());
00395          ret.AddRange(fields.ToArray());
00396          return ret.ToArray();
00397       }

00660       public UserMethod DefineMethod(string name, MethodAttributes attributes, IdEntry returnType, IdEntry[] parameterTypes, String[] parNames)
00661       {
00662          if (this.GetMethod(name, BindingFlags.ExactBinding, null, LibraryChecker.ToArray<Type>(parameterTypes), null) != null)
00663             throw new InvalidOperationException("The member has already been defined on the class");
00664 
00665          UserMethod method = new UserMethod(this.Entry, name, returnType, parameterTypes, parNames, attributes);
00666          this.methods.Add(method);
00667          return method;
00668       }
00669 
00677       public UserConstructor DefineConstructor(MethodAttributes attributes, IdEntry[] parameterTypes, String[] parNames)
00678       {
00679          if (this.GetConstructor(BindingFlags.ExactBinding, null, LibraryChecker.ToArray<Type>(parameterTypes), null) != null)
00680             throw new InvalidOperationException("The member has already been defined on the class");
00681 
00682          UserConstructor constructor = new UserConstructor(this.Entry, parameterTypes, parNames, attributes);
00683          this.constructors.Add(constructor);
00684          return constructor;
00685       }
00686 
00691       public UserConstructor DefineTypeInitializer()
00692       {
00693          if (staticConstructor == null)
00694          {
00695             staticConstructor = new UserConstructor(this.Entry, new IdEntry[] {}, new string[] {},
00696                                                     MethodAttributes.Static | MethodAttributes.Private | MethodAttributes.HideBySig | MethodAttributes.SpecialName | MethodAttributes.RTSpecialName);
00697             return staticConstructor;
00698          }
00699          else
00700             throw new InvalidOperationException("Type '" + this.FullName + "' already has a static constructor.");
00701       }
00702 
00710       public UserField DefineField(string name, FieldAttributes attributes, IdEntry fieldType)
00711       {
00712          if (this.GetField(name) != null)
00713             throw new InvalidOperationException("The member has already been defined on the class");
00714          
00715          UserField field = new UserField(this.Entry, name, fieldType, attributes);
00716          this.fields.Add(field);
00717          return field;
00718       }

00733       public void AddInterface(IdEntry type)
00734       {
00735          Type interfac = (Type) type.ReflectionObject;
00736          if (!interfac.IsInterface || this.interfaces.Contains(type))
00737             throw new InvalidOperationException("The type already implements the specified interface");
00738 
00739          this.interfaces.Add(type);
00740       }
00741 
00750       public override Type MakeArrayType()
00751       {
00752          if (arrayType == null)
00753             arrayType = new UserType(this.name + "[]", this.namespaceName, this.attributes, this.Entry);
00754          return arrayType;
00755       }

00765       public void CheckInterfaces()
00766       {
00767          foreach (Type t in this.GetInterfaces())
00768          {
00769             foreach (MethodInfo m in t.GetMethods(BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy))
00770             {
00771                ParameterInfo[] p = m.GetParameters();
00772                Type[] par = new Type[p.Length];
00773                for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
00774                {
00775                   par[i] = p[i].ParameterType;
00776                }
00777                MethodInfo impl = this.GetMethod(m.Name, BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy, null, par, null);
00778                if (impl == null || (!this.IsAbstract && impl.IsAbstract) || impl.ReturnType != m.ReturnType)
00779                   throw new CheckerException("Interface " + t.FullName + " not completely implemented: method " + m.Name);
00780             }
00781          }
00782          if (baseType != null && !this.IsAbstract && !this.IsInterface)
00783          {
00784             foreach (MethodInfo m in BaseType.GetMethods(BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy))
00785             {
00786                if (m.IsAbstract)
00787                {
00788                   ParameterInfo[] p = m.GetParameters();
00789                   Type[] par = new Type[p.Length];
00790                   for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
00791                   {
00792                      par[i] = p[i].ParameterType;
00793                   }
00794                   MethodInfo impl = this.GetMethod(m.Name, BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy, null, par, null);
00795                   if (impl == null || impl.IsAbstract)
00796                      throw new CheckerException("Abstract methods on " + BaseType.FullName + " not overridden: method " + m.Name);
00797                }
00798             }
00799          }
00800       }
00801    }
